title: Sony Xperia 10 IV shown off in leaked renders with a notchless display
content:
Following the Sony Xperia 1 IV leak last week, leaked renders of another Sony phone — Xperia 10 IV — has now surfaced online, revealing its design and some specifications. Leaked renders of the Xperia 10 IV, coming from notable leaker OnLeaks via Zoutons, give us the first look at Sony’s 2022 mid-range offering. The

The post Sony Xperia 10 IV shown off in leaked renders with a notchless display appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Leaked renders of the Xperia 10 IV give us the first look at Sony’s 2022 mid-range offering. Read on to know more.
